decision_conditions: The replacement trees (for T1 & T5 only) must be planted where the existing tree's currently are located by April 2026; the tree should be of a Betula Spp. of any variety which will be more suited to the site and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted. No replacement is required for T3.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species and in order to preserve the character and appearance of this part of Perth Close/Northolt Park.
| The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO.614 T1 - Lombardy Poplar - fell
TPO.614 T3 - Poplar - fell
TPO.614 T5 - Poplar - fell
TPO.614 T4 - Poplar - remove Deadwood
TPO.614 T6 - Poplar - remove Deadwood
